segments.text: This is the new KFP Noodle Production Facility.
Something's not right about it.
Sometimes people go in, but never come out.
And the files I've found, the things I've seen...
And now this.
Another anonymous tip, just like the others.
Perfect timing.
Almost too perfect.
And they don't mention what happens after 2 a.m.
Keep an eye out for me, B-Gen.
We don't have a lot of time to find both these documents.
They said KFP UT-002 files were here.
Ah, they just wrote.
You'll know the key when you see it.
What do they mean by that?
Wait.
When you need to hide a key,
hide where they look, but never see.
Try the sink, and clear the dust,
and place the key to avoid the rust.
What the?
Those aren't my memories. There's no way.
Who did this to me?
No time to think about this.
Why does this key unlock?
There's nothing around here that needs a key, unless...
Wait a minute.
I guess if you think about it, this does count as a filing cabinet of sorts.
There are a lot of papers in it, so...
They said these files will lead me closer to the answers I'm looking for.
Shadow-resistant properties introduced after mobile samples lost during variable user height testing.
Huh?
Someone there?
Who?
What was that noise?
No time.
Gotta read.
Anti-slip hook added after feathers kept dipping into broth.
What?
That came from the sink.
I'm sure of it.
Who are you?
Show yourself!
No, nothing here.
Wait.
I come from-
Me?
What?
What?
What?
What?
Oh, okay, let me, oh, nothing to worry about.
Just a frog in my throat.
Okay, no, running out of time.
Okay, I'm just gonna upload this file
and you guys look through it for me.
Um, okay, where would they hide the second one?
Let me think.
Um, if it were me, if I were the head
of the research division trying to hide documents,
Where would I put them?
The end of shift, machinery cooling down.
What if I hide it inside this machine?
It's so simple.
Wait, I lied.
Good hiding place.
How does a machine like this work?
I'm not a fryer.
How do they make these doodles?
Wait, let me give it a shot.
There's all kinds of rumors floating about this place.
Like that it should be impossible to put that much protein and vitamins in the ramen.
And that the flavor density breaks testing meters.
And that sometimes, they'll even make strange, overly dramatic marketing videos.
That was the main power. Disengage emergency stop, press the start button, then disengage
all the heat units so that the vial doesn't burn. Finally, run the conveyor belt in reverse.
And now just wait. Okay, this is taking too long. I'm speeding it up.
Wait, how did I know to do that? I've never done that before.
Why was it here?
Like, they knew I would check here
and knew I'd somehow be able to operate the machinery.
Knew I'd be able to find it.
All right, come on, come on, not much time.
Let's look in the file.
Let's see what they wanted me to find.
Product development report, final phase.
Bribery successful.
Michelin star cooking skills acquired.
Massive flavor improvements are introduced.
Major breakthrough.
30 grams of protein achieved in ramen with the inclusion of quinoa and weight.
Initial proposals submitted by C727 in response to health department concerns argued that the
constant boiling temperature of broth would eliminate any contamination risks from avian
staff members. Notes in margin, besides worst case scenario just improves the flavor profile.
The health inspectors chicken skin crumbles integration successful provides perfect crunch while maintaining no refrigeration shelf stability
There's got to be more information on this. Oh, no. Oh
I gotta get out of here.
I gotta...
What is...
